verses.verse: Faithful <S%G4103><s%> is <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>saying<s%>, <S%G1487>If<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G3713>seeketh<s%> the office of a <S%G1984>bishop<s%>, he <S%G1937>desireth<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%>.

The <S%G1985>bishop<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1511>be<s%> without <S%G423>reproach<s%>, the <S%G435>husband<s%> of <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%>, <S%G3524>temperate<s%>, <S%G4998>sober-minded<s%>, <S%G2887>orderly<s%>, given to <S%G5382>hospitality<s%>, apt to <S%G1317>teach<s%>;

(but <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1492>knoweth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1492>how<s%> to <S%G4291>rule<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>, <S%G4459>how<s%> shall he take <S%G1959>care<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>?)
not <S%G3361><s%> a <S%G3504>novice<s%>, <S%G3361>lest<s%> being <S%G5187>puffed<s%> up he <S%G1706>fall<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2917>condemnation<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil<s%>.

Moreover <S%G1161><s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3141>testimony<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> them that are <S%G1855>without<s%>; <S%G3361>lest<s%> he <S%G1706>fall<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3680>reproach<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3803>snare<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil<s%>.

Deacons <S%G1249><s%> in <S%G5615>like<s%> manner must be <S%G4586>grave<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1351>double-tongued<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> given <S%G4337>to<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> greedy of filthy <S%G146>lucre<s%>;

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1381>let<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> be <S%G1381>proved<s%>; <S%G1534>then<s%> let them serve as <S%G1247>deacons<s%>, if they <S%G5607>be<s%> <S%G410>blameless<s%>.

Women <S%G1135><s%> in like <S%G5615>manner<s%> must be <S%G4586>grave<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1228>slanderers<s%>, <S%G3524>temperate<s%>, <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> they that have served <S%G2573>well<s%> as <S%G1247>deacons<s%> <S%G4046>gain<s%> to <S%G1438>themselves<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G898>standing<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3954>boldness<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

but <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> I tarry <S%G1019>long<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> thou mayest <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> men <S%G1163>ought<s%> to behave <S%G390>themselves<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, the <S%G4769>pillar<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1477>ground<s%> of the <S%G225>truth<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> without <S%G3672>controversy<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of <S%G2150>godliness<s%>; <S%G2316>He<s%> who was <S%G5319>manifested<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G1344>Justified<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%>, <S%G3700>Seen<s%> of <S%G32>angels<s%>, <S%G2784>Preached<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%>, Believed <S%G4100>on<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>, Received <S%G353>up<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>.
